activities: Filepicker is a SaaS business in the growing Internet File System market. The company’s enterprise-grade SaaS solution provides end-to-end connectivity for files no matter where they live or where they’re needed. In terms of personal information, Filepicker stores emails and encrypted passwords in its database. Its log files also store IP addresses of each request. No other personal information is stored in Filepicker's system.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: All personal data processed by Filepicker is covered under Filepicker's self-certification. This data covered includes manually processed data.
privacyprograms: Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) for organization human resources data; Direct Marketing Association (DMA) Safe Harbor Program for all other data.
